column2: "I'm sorry, but what is this? It's definitely a bird, but Hatosuke is closer to a pigeon...!"

"I made this Hatosuke doll while you were away. This is what you should have been looking for!
\"Coo, coo, I'm Hatosuke, coo!\""
"I'll give you this. If you see the real thing, just let me know, OK?"
"Hmm... For now, I'll just have to do the best I can to promote the Aries White Knights on my own."
"If you want to see how Hatosuke and I get along, you can watch us in my videos. Just search for \"Idola Channel\"!"
